H0.text: The 2014 'Bendgate' controversy/publicity concerned version 6 of which famous product. Samsung Galaxy S5

H1.text: The 2014 'Bendgate' controversy/publicity concerned version 6 of which famous product. Google Nexus 6

H2.text: The 2014 'Bendgate' controversy/publicity concerned version 6 of which famous product. HTC One M8

H3.text: The 2014 'Bendgate' controversy/publicity concerned version 6 of which famous product. IPhone6

A4.text: Shortly after its public release, it was reported the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus chassis was susceptible to bending under pressure, such as when carried tightly in a user's pocket.

A5.text: Apple knew the iPhone 6 and 6 Plus phones were more likely to bend than previous models.
